testcase.purpose: According to the default policy, a user agent must deny to access the external network image.

description.pre_condition: Make sure do_not_load_image.wgt is installed with the command : pkgcmd -i -t wgt -q -p /home/app/content/tct/opt/tct-widgetpolicy-w3c-tests/widgetpolicy/w3c/do_not_load_image.wgt
description.post_condition: Get the 'pkgid' of do_not_load_image.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -l, then uninstall the do_not_load_image.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -u -t wgt -q -n 'pkgid'

step.step_desc: Get the 'application id' of do_not_load_image.wgt with the command : xwalkctl, launch do_not_load_image.wgt with the command : xwalk-launcher 'application id'
step.expected: The screen shows "PASS" on green backgroud

step.expected: The screen shows "PASS" on green backgroud and a gray background of "...testing..." image is displayed.

testcase.purpose: Test that the user agent processes can assume the default port number of https.

description.pre_condition: Make sure the device can access to the network; Make sure load_image_from_port_443.wgt is installed with the command : pkgcmd -i -t wgt -q -p /home/app/content/tct/opt/tct-widgetpolicy-w3c-tests/widgetpolicy/w3c/load_image_from_port_443.wgt
description.post_condition: Get the 'pkgid' of load_image_from_port_443.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -l, then uninstall the load_image_from_port_443.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -u -t wgt -q -n 'pkgid'

step.step_desc: Get the 'application id' of load_image_from_port_443.wgt with the command : xwalkctl, launch load_image_from_port_443.wgt with the command : xwalk-launcher 'application id', if there is a pop-up box shows, click "Allow" button
step.expected: The screen shows "PASS" with green backgroud and a gray background of "...testing..." image is displayed.

testcase.purpose: Test that the user agent ignores <access> element with an unsupported scheme.

description.pre_condition: Make sure the device can access to the network; Make sure ignore_access_with_unsupported_scheme.wgt is installed with the command : pkgcmd -i -t wgt -q -p /home/app/content/tct/opt/tct-widgetpolicy-w3c-tests/widgetpolicy/w3c/ignore_access_with_unsupported_scheme.wgt
description.post_condition: Get the 'pkgid' of ignore_access_with_unsupported_scheme.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -l, then uninstall the ignore_access_with_unsupported_scheme.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -u -t wgt -q -n 'pkgid'

step.step_desc: Get the 'application id' of ignore_access_with_unsupported_scheme.wgt with the command : xwalkctl, launch ignore_access_with_unsupported_scheme.wgt with the command : xwalk-launcher 'application id'
step.expected: The screen shows "PASS" on green backgroud.

testcase.purpose: Test that the user agent must compare hosts in a case-insensitive manner when the scheme is 'http'.

description.pre_condition: Make sure the device can access to the network; Make sure HTTP_compare_hosts_in_a_case-insensitive_manner.wgt is installed with the command : pkgcmd -i -t wgt -q -p /home/app/content/tct/opt/tct-widgetpolicy-w3c-tests/widgetpolicy/w3c/HTTP_compare_hosts_in_a_case-insensitive_manner.wgt
description.post_condition: Get the 'pkgid' of HTTP_compare_hosts_in_a_case-insensitive_manner.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -l, then uninstall the HTTP_compare_hosts_in_a_case-insensitive_manner.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -u -t wgt -q -n 'pkgid'

step.step_desc: Get the 'application id' of HTTP_compare_hosts_in_a_case-insensitive_manner.wgt with the command : xwalkctl, launch HTTP_compare_hosts_in_a_case-insensitive_manner.wgt with the command : xwalk-launcher 'application id'
step.expected: The screen shows "PASS" on green backgroud.
